title: okorieemmanuel
author: okorieemmanuel
content: Hello everyone. Please can you recommend a good bitcoin faucet script for PTC, offerwall and faucet. My current website is having problem because of the script. (Original Vie faucet script from tung).The script gives error even when users complete captcha correctly. I need a script that is also easy to I install or uninstall. Thank you in advance.

comments.author: ElSila
comments.body: Hello,I invite you to check out my faucet scripts available on my store: www.ScriptStore.xyzRegards!
